      • isValueBelowMinimum

        boolean isValueBelowMinimum(DirectCovTermPattern termPattern,
                            java.math.BigDecimal directValue,
                            Offering offering)
        Parameters:
        termPattern - Direct cov term pattern to get min value to compare directValue with
        directValue - The value to compare with
        offering - The offering to be used when determining what to compare directValue to
        Returns:
        Returns true if directValue is less than min value of termPattern using offering

      • isValueAboveMaximum

        boolean isValueAboveMaximum(DirectCovTermPattern termPattern,
                            java.math.BigDecimal directValue,
                            Offering offering)
        Parameters:
        termPattern - Direct cov term pattern to get max value to compare directValue with
        directValue - The value to compare with
        offering - The offering to be used when determining what to compare directValue to
        Returns:
        Returns true if directValue is greater than max value of termPattern using offering

      • validateValueInRange

        java.lang.String validateValueInRange(java.math.BigDecimal value)
        Validates that the passed value is between the minimum and maximum for this term.
        Returns:
        An error message if the current value does not lie in range, null otherwise.

      • renderValueForDisplay

        java.lang.String renderValueForDisplay(java.math.BigDecimal value)
        Render the supplied value in a form suitable to display on a page. Should distinguish between numerical and money types and process them accordingly.
        Parameters:
        value - a potential DirectCovTerm value
        Returns:
        a string representing this value as a DirectCovTerm
